HOLY DAY OF OBLIGATION7:00 a.m. (Korean)8:00 a.m. (English) 12:05 p.m. (English) 5:00 p.m. (English) 7:00 p.m. (Spanish) PUBLICHOLIDAY 9:30 a.m. (English) OUR LADY OF PERPETUAL HELP Every Wednesday 5:30 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. Mass 6:00 p.m. - 6:30 p.m. Novena SAINT JUDE THADDEUS Every Thursday 5:30 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. Novena 6:00 p.m. - 6:30 p.m. Mass BLESSED SACRAMENT Every first Friday of the month 12:30 p.m. - 5:30 p.m. Exposition 5:30 p.m. - 6:00 p.m. Benediction PADRE PIO Every first Saturday of the month 9:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m. CONFESSIONSSaturday 4:00 p.m. - 4:30 p.m. Confessions Monday - FridayFollowing the 12:05pm MassPlease keep in mind that the Priest is only available immediately after Mass and is not inclined to wait if there isn't anyone present
